com.tectonica.jonix

Class BasicColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tectonica.jonix.BasicColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JonixColumn<BasicProduct>

    public abstract class BasicColumn
extends Object
implements JonixColumn<BasicProduct>
    A base class for all the JonixColumns provided by the 'basic' suite of classes. Deriving from it are the columns themselves - ISBN13, Author, etc. - all intended to be presented in a tabular format.
    Author:
    Zach Melamed
